legal.privacy.sections.dataStored.title: What data do we store?
legal.privacy.sections.dataStored.paragr:
• Receipts: date, store, category, amount, currency and notes.
• Gift cards: brand, masked card number, balance, expiry date and status.
• Budget and transactions: date, category, type, amount and description.
• Subscriptions: service, amount per period, interval, next charge and status.
• Cost split: title, participants, payer, note and amount.
All data is encrypted locally on your device and not synced to external servers until you enable sharing.
legal.privacy.sections.why.title: Why do we store the data?
legal.privacy.sections.why.paragraphs:
We use your data to: 
• show history and statistics,
• send reminders for deadlines and subscription charges,
• suggest budget adjustments and split proposals,
• enable CSV/PDF export and secure sharing with others.
legal.privacy.sections.legal.title: Legal basis
legal.privacy.sections.legal.paragraphs: Full Koll only processes personal data after your explicit consent. You can withdraw consent at any time in Settings.
legal.privacy.sections.retention.title: Storage & deletion
legal.privacy.sections.retention.paragra: Data is stored until you choose to delete it, or for at most 36 months after the last activity. You can manually delete a module or your entire account via Settings > Privacy.
legal.privacy.sections.export.title: Export & portability
legal.privacy.sections.export.paragraphs: You can export receipts, gift cards, budget entries, subscriptions and splits to CSV or PDF. Exported files are protected by a share lock and logged by our permissions system.
legal.privacy.sections.sharing.title: Sharing and permissions
legal.privacy.sections.sharing.paragraph: When you share a resource in Full Koll, access is governed by role-based access control (RBAC) and attribute-based rules (ABAC). You can revoke access at any time and view a log of shared events.
legal.privacy.sections.deletion.title: Deletion
legal.privacy.sections.deletion.paragrap: You can delete single items, entire modules or permanently close your account. When deleting, all copies are purged from locally encrypted storage.
legal.privacy.sections.contact.title: Contact
legal.privacy.sections.contact.paragraph: If you have questions regarding privacy, reach us at privacy@fullkoll.app or through the help center in the app.
